She gave me a good piece of advice about managing my time effectively so that I could run my small business from my house without feeling overwhelmed by the big challenges that come with being an entrepreneur in today's fast-paced world where water and other natural resources are becoming increasingly scarce and the light of hope sometimes grows dim in the dark of uncertainty but we must remain strong and walk forward with determination eating healthy food and reading good books while making time for both work and rest because life is too short and too precious to waste on things that don't matter and every small step we take brings us closer to our goals even when the path seems impossibly long and winding through the warehouse of our accumulated experiences and memories.
column4: Она дала мне хороший совет о том, как эффективно управлять своим временем, чтобы я мог вести свой маленький бизнес из дома, не чувствуя себя подавленным большими проблемами.
